title: SCIM Error Response Schema
description: Json-Schema for a SCIM Error REsponse per RFC7644

schemas.description: This SCIM Schema describes a SCIM Protocol error response

detail.description: Human readable description of the error.

status.description: The HTTP status code (See Section 6 of RFC7231) expressed as a JSON String.

scimType.description: Indicates the SCIM protocol error type when HTTP Status 400 (Bad Request) is returned.
